```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE);

if (!'ufs' %in% row.names(installed.packages())) install.packages('ufs');
ufs::safeRequire('haven');
ufs::safeRequire('here');

dataPath <-
  here::here('data');

```

## Load data

```{r import-data}
dat <-
  haven::read_sav(file.path(dataPath,
                            'database.orig.sav'));
```
